title: Spinout: A Scratch-Built Multiplayer Online Racing Game
description: Spinout is an online muli-player, top down, arcade style racer. Slide, drift, and bounce your way to victory on recreations of real F1 tracks. I built Spinout over the course of two years, creating both the front and back end from scratch. This includes networking, graphics, physics, database management, AI, and more.
tech: Node.js, Express, Socket.io, Processing.js, Docker, AWS Elastic Beanstalk
